about.title: My Advantage
about.description1: I'm a software engineer with professional experience in front-end web development .
about.description2: My primary skill set includes React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and GraphQL. However, I do have experience with other technologies such as Vue and Gatsby JS.

about.description4: When I am not coding I enjoy studying Japanese and have passed both the JLPT N2 and Kanji Kentei Level 10 exams.
